message.title: Access Denied: Not Administrator
message.body: You are not an administrator.

message.title: Access Denied: Edit Permission Denied
message.body: Either this forum does not exist or you are not allowed to edit.

message.title: Access Denied: Not Moderator
message.body: You are not a moderator.

message.title: Duplicate Post
message.body: The administrator has configured the forums to not allow duplicate posts.

message.title: The file you requested cannot be found
message.body: We are sorry, but the file you requested has either been moved or deleted and is no longer available.

message.title: Not Found: Resource Not Found
message.body: The resource you requested does not exist.

message.title: User Account Created
message.body: Your user account has been successfully created. You will shortly receive an email containing a temporary password you can use to login.

message.title: Post Pending Moderation
message.body:
You have posted to a forum that requires a moderator to approve posts before they are publicly available.

If the administrator has configured this forum to support email notifications you will receive an email when your post is either approved or denied.

message.title: Post Not Found
message.body: The post you requested cannot be found or no longer exists. The administrator or moderator may have deleted the post.

message.title: No Post To Select
message.body: No post could be found for the URL requested.

message.title: Problem Posting
message.body: We apologize, but there was a problem posting your message. If you continue to experience this, please alert the administrator or moderator.

message.title: User Not Found
message.body: The user you requested cannot be found.

message.title: User Password Changed
message.body: The password has been changed successfully.

message.title: User Password Change Failed
message.body: An error occurred while attempting to change your password. Please try again.

message.title: Invalid User Credentials
message.body: The username and/or password cannot be validated or your account has not been approved yet.

message.title: No Unanswered Posts
message.body: No unanswered posts were found.

message.title: User does not accept Private Messages
message.body: The user you are attempting to send a private message to has turned off private messages.

message.title: User Search Returned No Results
message.body: Please change your user search criteria as no results were found.

message.title: No Active Posts
message.body: No Active Posts were found.

message.title: Private Messages To Self Not Allowed
message.body: You cannot send private messages to yourself.

message.title: Your account is pending approval
message.body: Until your account is approved you will be unable to sign in. You will receive an email when your account has been approved.

message.title: Welcome!
message.body:
Your account has been created and you are signed in. Congratulations!

You're now ready to meet like-minded community members and start participating in valuable conversations.

message.title: Account Not Approved
message.body: You have not been approved to access this community.

message.title: Account Banned
message.body: You are not allowed to access this community.

message.title: Unknown Login Error
message.body: We apologize, but an unknown error occurred while attempting to verify your credentials. Please try again.

message.title: Unable to Send Email
message.body: We apologize, but an error occurred while attempting to send email.

message.title: New User Registration Disabled
message.body: The administrator has disabled new account creation. Please check back later - or email the administrator - to see if it is possible to register.

message.title: Login Disabled
message.body: The administrator has globally disabled login. Please check back later - or email the administrator - to see if it is possible to login.

message.title: Access Denied
message.body: You do not have permissions to perform the requested action.

message.title: Access Denied: Post Permission Denied
message.body: Either this forum does not exist or you are not allowed to post.

message.title: ${group_propercase} Not Found
message.body: The requested ${group_propercase} cannot be found.

message.title: Email template not found
message.body: The requested email template cannot be found.

message.title: Search Unknown Error
message.body: We apologize, but an unknown error has occurred during search. Please try your search again.

message.title: Access Denied: Reply Permission Denied
message.body: Either the forum does not exist or you do not have permissions to reply to posts within the forum.

message.title: Access Denied: Announce Permission Denied
message.body: Either the forum does not exist or you do not have permissions to create announcements within the forum.

message.title: Permission Expired: Post Edit Permission Expired
message.body: The administrator has configured this forum to have a time limit for editing messages. If you still require a message to be edited, please check with a forum moderator.

message.title: Post Locked
message.body: This post is locked and does not allow replies.

message.title: Permission Expired: Post Delete Permission Expired
message.body: The administrator has configured this forum to have a time limit for deleting messages. If you still require a message to be deleted, please check with a forum moderator.

message.title: Access Denied: Delete Permission Denied
message.body: Either the forum does not exist or you do not have permission to delete posts within the forum.

message.title: Skin Not Found
message.body: Skin file not found.

message.title: No Results Found
message.body: There were no search results found.

message.title: Attachment not Allowed
message.body: Your post has been saved, but the attachment was not.<p/>The administrator has denied uploads of certain file types and the file must have only one extension (filename.ext).

message.title: Access Denied
message.body: You do not have permission to view/download this item.

message.title: Email sent to user
message.body: The email was sent to the user.

message.title: Attachment Too Large
message.body: Your post has been saved, but the attachment was not.<p/>Your attachment exceeded the maximum size limit.<p/>While your post was submitted, if it was made to a moderated forum it will not be available until approved by a moderator.

message.title: Attachments Disabled
message.body: Your post has been saved, but the attachment was not.<p/>Attachments have been disabled by the forums administrator.

message.title: Secret Answer Changed
message.body: Your old secret answer has been successfully changed. Use it whenever it is required to recover your password.

message.title: Secret Answer Change Failed
message.body: An error occurred while attempting to change your secret answer. Please try again.

message.title: Role Not Found
message.body: The role you requested cannot be found.

message.title: Role Updated
message.body: Role details has been updated.

message.title: Role Deleted
message.body: Role has been deleted.

message.title: Role Operation Not Permitted
message.body: You could not perform the action you've just tried on selected role.

message.title: Resource not found
message.body: The resource you requested does not exist.

message.title: Access Denied: Post Flood Prevention
message.body: The required time between posts has not been met. Please wait a few seconds and try to post again.

message.title: Access Denied: Delete Permission Denied
message.body: Permission to delete the post has been denied. A post cannot be deleted if replies have been made to it.

message.title: No Unread Posts
message.body: No posts were found that you have not read.

message.title: User Password Reset
message.body: You have requested that a new password be generated and sent to your email address ({0}). Please allow up to 15 minutes for it to take effect.

message.title: User Password Link Sent
message.body: You have requested a link be sent to your email address ({0}) which will enable you to reset your password. The email will arrive shortly.

message.title: User Already Logged In
message.body: You are already logged in. If you were redirected here while trying to access another part of the site, please contact the administrator to request additional permissions.

message.title: Deactivated User Account
message.body: The user you have selected to view or contact has been deactivated by the administrator.

message.title: Invalid License
message.body: This site does not have an adequate license to complete the requested action. Please contact the administrator.

message.title: License Error
message.body: An error occurred while attempting to load currently installed licenses. Please contact the administrator.

message.title: Invitation is Missing or Invalid
message.body: New users are allowed to be created by invitation only. The invitation key was missing or is currently invalid.

message.title: Invitation Accepted
message.body: You have successfully accepted the invitation to join this community.

message.title: Welcome!
message.body: You have successfully accepted the invitation to join this community. Your account has been created and you are now signed in.

message.title: Duplicate Tag
message.body: A tag with the name specified already exists.

message.title: Blog File Quota Exceeded
message.body: The blog file storage total file size quota has been exceeded. Please try uploading a smaller file, or contact the site administrator to adjust the quota settings.

message.title: File Type Not Valid
message.body: This type of file is not allowed.

message.title: Blog File Storage Not Allowed
message.body: Blog File Storage is disabled.

message.title: Site File Quota Exceeded
message.body: The site file storage total file size quota has been exceeded. Please try uploading a smaller file, or contact the site administrator to adjust the quota settings.

message.title: File Storage Not Allowed
message.body: File storage is not currently allowed on this site.

message.title: User File Quota Exceeded
message.body: Your file storage total file size quota has been exceeded. Please try uploading a smaller file, or contact the site administrator to adjust the quota settings.

message.title: User Storage Not Allowed
message.body: User file storage is not currently allowed on this site.

message.title: Duplicate Page Keys Not Allowed
message.body: A page by this name exists in this wiki already. Please choose another name for this page.

message.title: Forums Temporarily Disabled
message.body: The administrator has temporarily disabled the forums.

message.title: ${groups_propercase} Temporarily Disabled
message.body: The administrator has temporarily disabled the ${groups_lowercase}.

message.title: Media Galleries Temporarily Disabled
message.body: The administrator has temporarily disabled the media galleries.

message.title: Blogs Temporarily Disabled
message.body: The administrator has temporarily disabled the blogs.

message.title: Wikis Temporarily Disabled
message.body: The administrator has temporarily disabled the wikis.

message.title: Default Wiki Page is Locked
message.body: The default page for a wiki can not be deleted. Please edit the content to be blank instead.

message.title: Maximum Upload Size Exceeded
message.body: The file was uploaded that was too large. Please upload a smaller file or contact your administrator to adjust allowed file size settings.

message.title: Unknown Request Error
message.body:
Your request could not be processed. This error can occur if:
  1. A file was uploaded that was too large
  2. The request was taking too long to process
  3. The request was formatted improperly
  4. An unexpected error occurred on the server

message.title: Duplicate Field Group Name
message.body: The Field Group name must be unique.

message.title: Over Licensed Settings
message.body: This installation of Zimbra Social is over its licensed settings, so your last request could not be fulfilled. Please contact your system administrator.

message.title: Over Licensed Settings
message.body: This installation of Zimbra Social is over its licensed settings, so your last request could not be fulfilled. Please contact your system administrator.

message.title: Membership Pending
message.body: Access to this group is pending the acceptance of your membership request. Please check back later.

message.title: Mute Successful
message.body: You will no longer receive e-mail notifications from this thread.

message.title: Page Not Found
message.body: The page you requested cannot be found or no longer exists. The administrator or moderator may have deleted the page.

message.title: Validation Error
message.body: An error occurred validating a field. Please go to the previous page and try again.

message.title: System Account
message.body: The user account you are trying to use is a built-in system account that can not be logged in or interacted with.

message.title: Filename Too Long
message.body: The filename attempting to be uploaded is too long, try a shorter filename.

message.title: Unable to Upload
message.body: The file is unable to be uploaded at this time, please try again later. If the problem persists, contact the site administrator.

message.title: Account Locked
message.body: Your account has been locked for exceeding the number of incorrect login attempts. Please try again later or contact the site administrator.

message.title: OAuth Request failure
message.body: A connection was unable to be made with the authentication server or a bad request was made, please try again later. If the problem persists, contact the site administrator.

message.title: OAuth Error
message.body: An error occurred while trying to validate the login, please try again later. If the problem persists, contact the site administrator.

message.title: Email Template Parsing Error
message.body: An error occurred while trying to parse an email template.

message.title: Content Fragment Rendering Error
message.body: An error occurred while trying to render the content fragment.

message.title: Post Comment too long
message.body: The comment you tried to add is too long.

message.title: Registration is unavailable
message.body: This site is not accepting new user registrations at this time.

message.title: OAuth Login Failed
message.body: Login failed, please try again. If the problem persists, contact the site administrator.

message.title: Comments not supported for specified content type.
message.body: The content you tried to comment on does not support comments.

message.title: Ratings not supported for specified content type.
message.body: The content you tried to rate does not support ratings.

message.title: Licensing Restriction
message.body: The action you performed is not allowed with the installed license.

message.title: User Account Not Created
message.body: User account has not been successfully created.

message.title: OAuth Client Application Authorization Not Allowed
message.body: This client doesn't have the grant type allowed to perform this type of authorization.

message.title: Duplicate Post
message.body: The administrator has configured the media gallery to not allow duplicate posts.

message.title: Administrator Login Disabled from IP
message.body: You are unable to login to an administrator account from your IP address.

message.title: Page not Found
message.body: The requested page is not a part of the current theme.

message.title: Site Not Active
message.body: This site is not currently active, please try again later or contact the site administrator.

message.title: Mailing List already exists
message.body: The requested mailing list is already in use.

message.title: Unable to process email
message.body: The email could not be processed.

message.title: CSS Rendering Error
message.body: There was an error rendering the CSS file.

message.title: System Account not found
message.body: The built-in anonymous or service user accounts have not been found.

message.title: Embeddable Content Fragment Error
message.body: There was a error with an embedded content fragment.

message.title: Unknown Error
message.body: We apologize, but an unknown error has occurred in the forums. <p/>This error has been logged.
